content: a textured and very stretchy children s sock for kids sized small preemie to around 8 years old extensive information on sizing is provided in the pattern to help you choose the right size and even if you end up a little bit off the stretchy nature of the waffle stitch pattern means you re probably fine anyway any fingering weight sock-type yarn can be used for this pattern go super-soft for the very youngest or the very picky and look for something with a little bit of nylon silk or nettles to add durability for kids who will wear their socks in shoes a typical sock yarn with 350-450 m / 370-490 yards per 100 g / 3 5 oz will require approximately 25 50 50 50 75 95 ** 130 140 190 230 ** m / 30 55 55 55 80 105 ** 145 155 210 250 ** yards for sizes small preemie ca 1 kg / 2 lbs preemie ca 2 kg / 4 lbs 0-3 m 3-6 m 6-12 m 1-2 y ** 2-3 y 3-4 y 5-6 y 7-8 y ** foot measurements and corresponding shoe sizes are given for reference in the actual pdf this pattern is provided for free as a way of paying the knitting community back for all the free patterns that once taught me how to knit socks
